author: A. Funk
content: We might need the old girl again before everything is done.if she’s floating and watertight keep her!!!!! All our enemies are building diesel boats again because they’re quieter than our nukes… keep her!!!!

author: Leo Almeida
content: Put it in Dry dock, cut it up and sell it for scrap. The oceans are full of enough of our waste .

author: David Bruce
content: No , Please place it back in the yard . David

author: Pete Moody
content:
I do not agree with the Sinking of this Submarine , it does not take 2.7 Million to strip out components
The Ocean is not a dumping ground for our waste , let a private enterprise take it over and maintain it
